page.title: 16BRITISH AEROSPACE
page.content:
control room. The main runway length is 1,437 m.
Current programmes cover the whole spectrum of aerospace technology, including civil and military aircraft, tactical missile systems, space satellite systems, and a wide range of related technologies. Over 60% of our business is in export markets, and our order book stands in the region of Â£5,000 million. Other products. Other advanced programmes by British Aerospace include underwater weapons and mine countermeasures, ships' weapons-control and surveillance systems, inertial navigation and reference systems, propellers for aircraft, hovercraft and wind-energy systems, precision gyros and gyro-based systems, plus many others.
